This is probably one of the best co-op games I have ever played. Between this and Borderlands, so much fun has been had.

The game has a limited number of maps, unless you go get news maps from the community. However, it always feels fresh if playing with mates.

You really need to play with real people, as the AI team mates can be a bit annoying, so I'd recommend getting some frieds to buy this at the some time.

Left 4 Dead is a first-person shooter which is focused on cooperation and team play.
A handful of humans remain immune to the zombie virus. You play as one of a small group of them. There is Zoey, a young woman; Bill, the grizzled veteran; Louis, the middle-class office worker and Francis, the biker. Armed with weapons, these survivors must battle their way through the undead.
In each of the game scenarios, you must battle your way to a series of safe houses that lead to a rescue point. You can have up to four players in a game, controlling each of the characters, or the AI can fill in and control the bots.
Each scenario is presented like a movie. At the beginning there is a movie poster showing the cast. If you survive, the "credits" display the statistics for the game, like who killed the most zombies, who inflicted the most headshots, who delivered the most friendly fire, and so on. The final credit shows how many zombies were killed in the making of the film and also the film is dedicated to the memory of those survivors who did not make it to safety.
The zombie horde that you battle is based on the "fast" zombies. Besides of the zombies there are also special infected. There is the hunter, which can leap across large distances to pin a survivor to the ground. Then there is the smoker, which has a frog-like tongue that can grab a survivor by the throat. The boomer is a corpulent zombie that vomits or explodes to spray survivors. Getting hit by the substance will not only temporarily blind survivors, but it drives the zombie horde into a feeding frenzy. Last but not least there is the tank, he is brick of a zombie that can take an enormous amount of damage and dish out a fair amount. And finally, there is the witch; she is an enormously powerful zombie that can take down a survivor with a single swipe. 
All maps of Left 4 Dead are available now in the sequel, so it would be cheaper to buy only Left 4 Dead 2.
Still I would say that Left 4 Dead is an incredible and highly replayable multiplayer experience that is definitely worth checking out.

This is a genuine classic and it has been adored by many audiences. I personally can not get enough out of this game. I love it. The game is super fun to play with friends and just fun to play with random people too but it is best played with friends. The main goal of this game is to survive the campaign that you have chosen and not die. This game semelessly never ends as you keep doing campaigns over and over. If there were any flaws Left 4 Dead 2 fixed them. So this kinda leaves me at  a 10/10. Great work Valve :D

One of the best co op games out there and one of the best zombies game out there, Left 4 Dead is fun when playing online with random people, but the true delight comes when playing with friends. Hearing your friends panic when you know there's a witch nearby, coordinating when to us certain valuable supplies, ad communicating the locations and actions of the zombies together makes for an incredibly fun friday night at a friends house.

It's a very good game, but I wouldn't suggest getting it full price. I paid my girlfriend back after she got it for me full price to play with her, and after playing Left 4 Dead 2, both of which are the same price,  I would suggest Left 4 Dead 2. There are better mods, more zombies, melee weapons, and they're already the same price. It is still a good game, and if you wait for sales I would highly recommend it at 50-75% off with the Left 4 Dead bundle.

Ваще шикарная игра. Там, короче, 3 человека и женщина-бегают, прыгают и трупаков живых валят. Повсюду кровь, мясо, кишки и тра-та-та. Есть ещё там вечно блюющий жиробас приятной внешности, гопник в толстовке с межпозвонковой грыжей, ползующий на четвереньках, дылда с языком таким, что любая баба рада будет, и трёх-створчатый шкаф с антресолью, который фиг завалишь. Вся эта шарага обильно смазана драйвом, шикарным музоном, и коктейлем молотова. Советую поиграть, особенно по сети.

I still love this old-school FPS game with it's simpler format.....tier one weapons = 3, tier 2 weapons = 3, and two pistols is as good as it gets....it all comes down to fighting it out and the tanks are fast agile creatures that try to kill you everytime, not just incap and run off.  The controls are simple. The action is fast and there is not much to do except get from point A to point B (saferoom or extraction) with boss fights and endurance.  This is definitely a game better with co-op multiple players since the "Team" is stronger than any one individual but there is a feature with AI controlled bots that will assist you if you play alone.  caveat BOTS ARE STUPID all the time. Strangers are usually on a learning curve or know what they are doing.  Even though this game is not actively supported now, there is a huge number of add-on maps and content with new players still purchasing this game in the tens of thousands. Occasionally someone gets the bright idea of being a troll, but they just don't get the team concept I guess. Did I mention that I love this game? You will too.

7 ans après sa sortie Left 4 Dead reste le meilleur jeu coop que j'ai pu essayer.
Un gameplay dynamique rapide demandant de bon réflexe ainsi qu'un bon teamplay.
Un joueur ne comptant que sur son skill n'ira pas loin. La communauté avec ces campagnes customs ont fait du très bon boulot.

Ce jeu reste tout simplement le meilleur de tous les FPS confondus malgrés ces 7 ans.

Un gioco del 2008 che non ha bisogno di grandi presentazioni; nel 2013 è ancora in grado di divertire molto!! Se volete sparare a raffica su zombie e cooperare con amici online, questo è il gioco che fa per voi!
Это просто ОХУЕННАЯ игруха советую всем поиграть в неё :3

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Spiel: 

Left 4 Dead ist ein Multiplayer FPS-FUN-Shooter mit kleiner Survival Nebenstory und Zwischensequenzen. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Einzelspieler:

Ist der Offline Multiplayer mit Bots, was mir persönlich garkeinen Spass gemacht hat.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Mehrspieler: 

Hier geht das Spiel richtig auf, im TeamSpeak mit seinen Kumpels zusammen agieren macht richtig Spass. UserMaps kann man sich wenn es zu langweilig wird noch einfach dazu installieren/packen was das Spiel sehr frisch hält.
Laggs gab’s bei mir ganz selten und haben mich bis jetzt kaum gestört. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Grafik:

Ist gut gemacht, keine großartigen Grafikfehler aufgefallen (ausser getötete Zombies in Wänden oder Gegenständen, was nicht gestört hat) und hängen geblieben bin ich auch nicht. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Musik:

Die Musik ist sehr gut gewählt und an den Jukeboxen kommt man wird man wohl nie vorbei kommen ohne sie anzuschalten^^.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Steuerung:

Ich habe es nur mit Maus und Tastatur gezockt, wie man einen Ego-Shooter auch spielen sollte. Ich benutzte die Standard Einstellungen und habe alles gut erreicht.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pro/Contra:

+ ein Multiplayer Abend der immer Spass macht
- im Singleplayer echt langweilig

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fazit:

Wenn das Spiel im Angebot ist würde ich immer zuschlagen, am besten L4D1/L4D2 Bundle. Ich habe kauf nicht bereut und da die Community immer noch Kampagnen und Maps liefert kann man Problemlos weiter spielen. Man sollte es allerdings wenn man die Deutsche Version hat um es ungeschnitten zu spielen „Left4Uncut“ Downloaden.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Zusammengefasst: 

Einzelspieler: 1/10
Mehrspieler: 8/10
Grafik: 7/10
Musik: 7/10
Steuerung: 10/10
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Spiel: 7/10
Ein tolles spiel auch wenn die Grafik nicht so neu ist ;=)

From a technicall standpoint, the game has good graphics, incredible performance, ground breaking AI and pathfinding (and NPC animation) technology.
It also has an excelent artistic desing and an impresive, loud yet satisfying sound direction (both with gunshots, and character voices).
Co-op is pure fun, and encourage (if not obligate) players to work together or die separately.
Versus, is a whole different thing, it gives you the chance to relax and enjoy while you hunt for some survivor flesh, or you tech the infected who´s the boss.
The story in the game might not be as evident as it may be, but it encourages players to imagine by providing rich and detailed background escenarios filled with proof that others have been there before, and in some cases even left messages to let others know how they are.
If you like zombies, guns, or just some fun an innovative co-op play, you can´t go wrong with Left 4 Dead.
